item.title: Trump urges US Supreme Court to delay TikTok ban
item.description: Trump says that he could negotiate a 'political resolution' for TikTok if the high court intervenes.

item.title: Ukrainians hope for a New Year prisoner exchange with Russia
item.description: There have been just ten exchanges of prisoners of war in 2024 but families want their loved ones back.

item.title: Romeo and Juliet actress Olivia Hussey dies aged 73
item.description: The Golden Globe-winning actress was best known for her role as Juliet in the 1968 film adaptation of the Shakespeare play.

item.title: How old English sea shanties inspired Cape Verdean singer
item.description: Carmen Souza's latest album is inspired by the little-known British influence on the Cape Verde islands.

item.title: 'It's still in shambles': Can Boeing come back from crisis?
item.description: Safety issues with the Boeing 737 Max and mass employee strikes made for a challenging 2024.
